title: What are the best YouTube channels for class 12 maths? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don't about the best channel for that subject but I can guide you to study from textbook or Rd Sharma (theory) Or if you really want to use YouTube then you can search for Cbseclassesvideos Examfear That's all I know Better option I can tell you is that to go for a DLP (distance learning program) from a good coaching centre or some video pendrive of from study If you feel that you want something else than this than please do comment me I don't know how to answer as I am not a professional writer on Quora And I am 12th pass student of 2018 batch I scored 79.2% in class 12th (PCMB) AND 82% in PCM

If you really wanted to study from you tube, then following are the better options for you: Rk gupta mathematicsNeha Agrawal Mathematically InclinedLearning with passion- sanyam badola sirCbse class videos (for boards).These are some of the best you tube channel for mathematics. If you will learn from them , all your concepts will be clear. And Don't forget to practice as much as questions you can! All the best.
